Weightless Tower Shield

shield (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 149
armor id [armor]: 65 (Weightless Tower Shield)
protection, shield [protshield]: 16
parry [parry]: 8
restriction [cannotwear]: cannot be worn by mounted units

Requires 10A to forge (A2)

This tower shield is enchanted with Air magic, making it light and quick. Tower shields can't be used by mounted troops.
